1.6.20  10:10 pm   A lot of the time, I feel inferior to my younger sibling. Everybody loves him, and some even hate me for not liking him, even though he gets away with everything including physical violence. He's not young either. It's gotten to the point where I want to just not exist. Any good words to think of when I'm sad?

Â Â Â Â Â 'confluence' is a nice word, but that's probably not the best solution to your problem. i think you should spend some time away from your sibling. it sounds like being around him is the source of some troubles

1.6.20  9:41 pm   Planets are music trees! Bring some heavy matter together, in the right spot in relation to the sun, add water, wait a few billion years, and it will be a music-producing planet!

Â Â Â Â Â that's a good point

1.6.20  5:25 pm   i want to get lots of stuff done, but i enjoy working slowly and having unfinished work that i can go back to at any point. should i continue doing everything slowly or try to speed up my process in order to get more stuff done?

Â Â Â Â Â if you start feeling a very loud sense of panic about not completing enough things, then it might be time to look into a completion scheme or schedule

1.6.20  1:52 pm   is there more than one 4th dimension, and better yet, is there more than one 3rd one?

Â Â Â Â Â i think if you are counting dimensions, you would use 1 number for each dimension. that is generally how to do counting

1.6.20  1:45 pm   Do you ever watch/have you watched any content that other people (fans, other youtubers) made about you? Contents like biography-like videos, songs analysis videos?

Â Â Â Â Â i have seen some of it

      If yes, what does it feel like to inspire people to do those content about you

Â Â Â Â Â pretty good

      and watching yourself on their perspective?

Â Â Â Â Â strange sometimes

      Is it scary, exciting, inspiring?

Â Â Â Â Â somewhat

Â Â Â Â Â this one

1.6.20  12:36 pm   i have a synth at home and i really want to learn how to play it, but every time i try i always give up pretty much instantly. please give me something to make a jingle about (it has fun sounds in addition to piano)

Â Â Â Â Â you must make a jingle about making jingles. that is the only way

1.6.20  11:13 am   Is there any video where you say "pepper"? 

Â Â Â Â Â i'm not sure

1.6.20  11:09 am   Bill, I'm just writing to say i am impressed with your amazing song skills. Some of your older songs are pure genius, such as "The Song Song" which is how I feel exactly when I try to write a song. And the same goes for your new songs! For example, I could write an entire essay on "might quit", your latest song, due to all the weird, wacky metaphors in it. I honestly don't know how you do such astonishing work.

Â Â Â Â Â holy smokes, you are very friendly

      Keep going, I can tell the new vid will be worth the almost-year-long wait! ðŸ˜Š

Â Â Â Â Â well hold on just a moment there, that is not the attitude i want anyone to have ..... i am not working on 1 video, i am preparing to make very many videos, using very new methods. the first one will almost assuredly be the worst, kind of like it was the last time i did this (2014)

1.6.20  11:08 am   are bagels a sandwich or a cereal?

Â Â Â Â Â both

1.6.20  10:53 am   What was your inspiration for "and the day goes on"? It's my favourite song.

Â Â Â Â Â i guess i got jealous of another time, maybe in the 1800s, where people would just bang out a song on the banjo or something. so i went to the keyboard and played this, and said "songify that" and then eventually the songwriting department got hold of that (also me) and completed it. and then 2 years later the recording department got it, but that's a different story

1.6.20  10:49 am   When will there be a new video=

Â Â Â Â Â uefcking right away

Â Â Â Â Â set them free

Â Â Â Â Â if you have ever liked anyone then you are likeable

1.6.20  9:29 am   what movies and games do you have on your very strong blimp?

Â Â Â Â Â i have no such blimp, but i do have a copy of spiderman into the spiderverse. unfortunately despite my best efforts i still cannot seem to convert it into an actual digital mp4 file. strange. you would think for the right price i would be able to somehow get that. all i ever wanted to do is watch it frame by frame

1.6.20  9:16 am   Would you give me a very short jazz piano lesson on Skype?

Â Â Â Â Â first you would have to give me a lesson on how to know or care whether something is jazz or not

      In return I'd give you either a violin lesson, send photos of a Norwegian Donald Duck pocket book from 1994 or show you how to unmake pancakes.

1.6.20  6:36 am   I groove to your music while running. You seem to use a really consistent beat in all of your songs. Was this on purpose?

Â Â Â Â Â yes

      It's an aesthetic tempo. Love from Australia

Â Â Â Â Â i think about 98% of all songs have a consistent tempo, and if we're talking about music in the last 20 years i'd say it's more like 99.95%. you really can't give me any credit for that

Â Â Â Â Â i am working intensely on developments in the graphics department. but songwriting and songs is still the most important department, or possibly tied for first place
